name: Timothy Dougherty
title: Parent of Common Build Student
review: ““This program has provided my children with the tools they need to properly learn and develop in such a fast-moving world.”

name: Jessica Smith
title: Student, Grade 6 (Challenge Build)
review: “The instructors were very helpful, guiding me the entire time and helping me when I messed up!”

name: Joseph Miller
title: Student, Grade 11 (Creative Build)
review: “Designing and building a robot was the most fun and interactive activity I have done in a while, and I was always able to ask for help.”

name: Jane Brown
title: Student, Grade 8 (Creative Build)
review: “Prior to coming to RoboReach, I have been involved with robotics for around 3 years now. Yet, RoboReach's creative build program was still fun and exciting for me.”
